comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Dr. Josef Goricar (b. 1873) originally from Pressberg in Styria, resigned from the Austro-HUngarian Consular Service in December 1914; in November 1915, he gave a statement to the Providence Journal, claiming that there were German and Austrian spies throughout the US. "The Austrian embassy denounced Dr. Goricar as a liar and a paid agent of the Russian Government." query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F20F13F8385B17738... books.google.com/books?id=aGeHnWinaXIC&lpg=PA294&... books.google.com/books?id=ZKMMAAAAYAAJ&lpg=PA290&...
